display_long_description:
Step into the boots of a soldier in Days of Heroes: D-Day and relive one of the most epic moments of World War II in VR.

The game delivers a full campaign experience with missions that feel straight out of the greatest war stories: fight through narrow trenches, hold the line under heavy fire, destroy enemy tanks, and push forward with your squad. From brutal beach landings to desperate last stands, every mission is designed to capture the intensity and atmosphere of wartime combat.

Use over a dozen authentic World War II weapons, faithfully recreated in look and mechanics. Tackle a wide variety of objectives — from close‑quarters skirmishes to long‑range firefights and daring sabotage operations.

Once you finish the campaign, sharpen your skills on a dedicated shooting range with four different modes. Ready for a challenge? Try the Hardcore Mode, pushing your tactics and survival instincts to the limit.

Whether you’re a fan of classic, story‑driven war shooters or looking for an immersive VR battle experience, Days of Heroes: D-Day brings the intensity and atmosphere you’re looking for.

▶️ Try the free demo here: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3346478685453854/
🌍 More info: www.dohvr.com
📣 Join our community: www.dohvr.com/discord
